member.name: IDCompositionEffectGroup.SetOpacity
member.summary: Changes the value of the Opacity property.
member.param: The new value of the Opacity property.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionEffectGroup.SetOpacity
member.summary: Animates the value of the Opacity property.
member.param: An animation that represents how the value of the Opacity property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionEffectGroup.SetTransform3D
member.summary: Sets the 3D transformation effect object that modifies the rasterization of the visuals that this effect group is applied to.
member.param: Pointer to an interface or one of its derived interfaces. This parameter can be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionEffectGroup
member.summary: Represents a group of bitmap effects that are applied together to modify the rasterization of a visual's subtree.
